name: Loot The Room
description:
In this game you enter a room.
The goal is to find a safe and its password. Then you can open it and loot whats inside. 
To do this you can interact with different objects and find notes that give you some hints.

Controls:

  • use WASD to move
  • use your Mouse to look around
  • press E to interact with objects
  • Press TAB to Pause

Note: At the beginning the room is pretty dark, so make sure too look around to find the light switch.
